mapper.select: select cm.perms from cb_user_role cur LEFT JOIN cb_role cr on cur.role_id = cr.id LEFT JOIN cb_role_menu crm ON crm.role_id = cur.role_id LEFT JOIN cb_menu cm on cm.id = crm.menu_id where cr.status = 0 AND cur.user_id = 3
select cm.* FROM cb_user cu LEFT JOIN cb_user_role cur on cur.user_id = cu.id LEFT JOIN cb_role_menu crm on crm.role_id = cur.role_id LEFT JOIN cb_menu cm on cm.id = crm.menu_id where cu.id = ${id}
